body_html: Grappler optimizations will be available in 2.0 for any code which is inside a function (decorated with @defun). We believe that will be most code, so graph-level optimizations will definitely be a thing.
body_text: Grappler optimizations will be available in 2.0 for any code which is inside a function (decorated with @defun). We believe that will be most code, so graph-level optimizations will definitely be a thing.
body: Grappler optimizations will be available in 2.0 for any code which is inside a function (decorated with `@defun`). We believe that will be most code, so graph-level optimizations will definitely be a thing.
